en.autostart_enable_failed: Failed to enable or start the autostart service.

en.sshkey_invalid_tooltip: SSH key authentication failed. Click 'Edit' to retry the setup.

en.wizard_tempfile_error: An error occurred while creating or writing the temporary script file.
en.wizard_timeout_warn: SSH key installation was not confirmed. You may have entered an incorrect password or the remote server is unreachable.
